BRIEF-Altura Mining To Undertake Capital Raising Of About $21.5 Million

Commodities 8 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 12:42)

BRIEF-Altura Mining To Undertake Capital Raising Of About $21.5 Million Oct 17 (Reuters) - Altura Mining Ltd : * IS UNDERTAKING A CAPITAL RAISING OF APPROXIMATELY $21.5 MILLION (BEFORE COSTS) * ENTITLEMENT OFFER IS FOR 2 NEW SHARES FOR EVERY 13 EXISTING SHARES,NEW SHARES TO BE ISSUED AT A PRICE OF A$0.06 PER SHARE
